name: Hyper Dice
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam!
I was the sole developer.

Its a top down shooter with 6 random guns you can get and 6 random modifiers to said guns. This results in a total 36 possible guns! Shoot the many enemies coming your way to achieve a new highscore!

Hope you enjoy!
